article:
People like dolphins because they are both lovely and clever. They have an _ IQ  .
Dolphins can 'talk'. Scientists try to 'talk' with dolphins, and the results make them  _ . They find that dolphins _  understand them so well.
 Most  animals enjoy playing, but dolphins like to make their games different. On a beautiful day in 1997, scientists on a beach  _ a little dog going into the sea. They were surprised to see the dolphins come up to the dog and then start throwing  it into the air. The dog  _ the 'game' and kept playing with the dolphins for over an hour.
Dolphins live in a very different world from _ , but they are very good at our 'IQ tests '. For example, in the picture above, a dolphin jumps out of the water when he hears a whistle noise . He does this because he will get a fish _ an award.
There is _ much to learn about these lovely friends.
